main event: Three witnesses observed a very bright pulsating light in the sky, which changed colors from red to greyish, on September 1, 1966.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for several minutes., The object appeared to be the size of a basketball and traveled at a very high rate of speed., All three witnesses remarked on the brightness of the object, noting it was much brighter than any star or planet., Observers noted an illusion of zigzag motion associated with the object's path., The light was eventually concluded to be the re-entry of the ECHO 1 satellite.
witness description: A family returning home from a visit, including the wife, husband, and their son.
